# Government Tender Announcement - Mechanical, Hydraulic and Armament Components

**Contract Reference:** WS4361703594-Doc4375047598

**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-03
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-03 14:00:00

**Expansion of Requested Services:** Amendment to Closing Time

Please disregard the original closing time for bid submission. All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by **2024-06-03 14:00:00 EDT**. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

** Request for Proposal (RFP) Description: **

The tender is issued by the **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** on behalf of the **Department of National Defence (DND)**. It is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the repair, overhaul (R&O) and upgrade of the Leopard 2 Main Battle Tank (MBT) turret mechanical, hydraulic and armament components.

**Projected Contract Dates:**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2027-05-24
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)

**Key Details:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Trade Agreements Applicable:** Various, including Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information:**

* **Contact Name:** Aleinik, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** <andrew.aleinik@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Flow of Information:**

The bid submission can be found on the Ariba Discovery platform: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18404501?extsite=MTg0MDQ1MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Take note of the changes to the closing time and submission guidelines. Please address any inquiries to Andrew Aleinik, Burtonor MICAGTL-PSPC.
